description: Public authorities are required by Section 2800 of Public Authorities Law to submit annual reports to the Authorities Budget Office that includes summary financial information. The dataset consists of 3 years of information from the statement of net assets and the statement of revenues, expenses and change in net assets reported by Local Authorities.

metadata.attribution: New York State Authorities Budget Office (ABO)

name: Summary Financial Information for Local Authorities
